title: cooperative_nursing_two_mothers
summary: Two mother dogs cooperatively nursing and caring for puppies.
description: This data unit documents cooperative maternal behavior between two mother dogs, 'Khao Nung' and 'Khao Niew', jointly nursing and caring for puppies born on December 9â€“10, 2025. The mothers share caregiving responsibilities, including breastfeeding and physical proximity, demonstrating cooperative parenting under limited-resource conditions.

system_context.significance: supports survival and welfare of offspring

external_reference.note: Observed cooperative nursing behavior between two mother dogs.
